title: Problem-Based Collaborative Learning for Developing Scientific Literacy and Reasoning Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Concepts and University-Level Language Comprehension Skills
context.additional_context: Graduate language program conducting project-based assessments in limited-technology environments (primarily smartphones)

learning_goals: Learners generate scientific hypotheses by analyzing complex linguistic data
Learners perform evidence collection and evaluation processes through collaborative problem-solving with peers
Learners improve their ability to define problems and generate questions after observing real-world language phenomena

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
